about: For years I took the leap from graphic design and audiovisual to web development and system administration.
I started with the basics of development, HTML, CSS and JS and I have been updating with frameworks and new technologies such as Vue, Angular, SCSS, SASS or LESS, PHP, Node, etc...
In addition, during the process I have learned related things such as, system administration, databases, version control, agile methodologies and others. Come on, normal.
My hobbies are, among others, board games, video games, role-playing and miniatures. Visit my social networks to get to know me a little more.
